title: Bug 37021 - Source path wrong in declare warning on binary files
description: Bug 37021 - Source path wrong in declare warning on binary files [java|aj]. Please refer to the code located in tests/new/binaryWarnings/.. to replicate the issue. It should be noted that these tests may produce false positives due to filename checking not being enabled in harness verification of messages. In some cases, the filenames may not appear at all, but this issue is not reproducible with these tests.
OB: When targeting .class files from injars in declare warning messages, the source path is listed in the form 'app.Main.class' instead of 'app/Main'. In some cases, the filenames do not appear at all, but these tests do not reproduce that specific problem.
EB: When targeting .class files from injars in declare warning messages, the source path is listed in the form 'app.Main.class' instead of 'app/Main'.
SR: Ensure that the source path is correctly displayed in declare warning messages when targeting .class files from injars.
